name: Ocean Wonder VR
description: Ocean Wonder VR is a Simulation VR Game. Collect different fish species and save the ocean from contamination. Make friends with mermaids and mysterious creatures in your undersea journey!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows7 / 8.1 / 10 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or GTX 1060 or better / AMD R9 290 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
